channel.title: Association on Variant Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Association on Variant Tools

item.title: Association analysis
item.description: Association Analysis 1. Statistical Tests for Genotype/phenotype Associations 1.1 The VAT association command We will introduce the basic usage of this command without diving into each association test. For a complete demonstration of all the tests please refer to the documentation for VAT (on the sidebar of this webpage). 1.2 Getting started The general interface of vtools associate is as follows % vtools associate -h usage: vtools associate [-h] [--covariates [COVARIATES [COVARIATES .
